name: White Rabbit
description: A frantically checking his pocket watch, which shows several impossible times at once.

dialogue.greeting: Late! Late! For a very important... wait, what time is it really?

about_time.initial: We're late! Or early! Or exactly on time! All at once!
about_time.schedule: The Queen's garden party is in negative three hours!
about_time.worry: Oh dear! Oh dear! The tarts are simultaneously done and not yet started!
